title: Lowest ranked play ever?
body: You guys know the lowest ranked player ever, I know somebody in Bronze 5 -13 lp

replies.body: I used to be Bronze V -100 LP... You literally cannot rank lower than that...
wait how did you even end up there? I always assumed that the very lowest ranked player must be some kind of bot.

You can only ever get negative LP by dodging. Your friend was Bronze V 0 LP and dodged twice in a row (-3 for the first dodge and -10 for the second).

I spent nearly 7 hours one Saturday dodging 12 games in a row (the 12th was to test if it really caps at -100 LP). Considering you get 30 minute waits, it took a long time.

wow that's some dedication, either that, or full ad melee teamcomps must not have been to your liking. Well at least someone managed to find out what the minimum lp was.
{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
